about_the_game:
This is a VR simulation and combat game with a martial arts theme. In the game, players take on the role of a martial arts master, learning secret martial arts techniques, flying with their swords, battling enemies, challenging various bosses, and seeking revenge for their master. Throughout the journey, the protagonist and their martial sister experience various aspects of daily life, and their relationship grows stronger.
Game Features:
[Sword Flying]
Experience the joy of flying with a sword in the world of immortals, finally! Players can now experience it firsthand!
[Exciting Combat]
Engage in thrilling battles against hordes of black-clothed enemies, leaping through bamboo forests, with flashing blades, flying hidden weapons, and the setting of deflecting souls. Immerse yourself in the combat experience!
[Various Sword Techniques]
Classic sword techniques from martial arts can be learned and experienced in the game, including Yin and Yang Dual Cultivation, Tai Chi Shield, Flashing Finger, Sword Flight, and Myriad Sword Dance...
[Diverse Bosses]
Players will have to defeat 9 bosses in the game, each with their own unique skills.
[Martial Sister's Daily Life]
Experience the daily life simulation with your martial sister, adding both excitement of battle and deep emotions to the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-4590 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200X or higher configuration
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti /AMD Radeon RX 470 or higher configuration
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DisplayPort video output
  • VR Support: Steam VR only, requires Oculus Touch/Valve Index controllers or better controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 /AMD Ryzen 1500X or higher configuration
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 Ti /AMD Radeon RX 480 or higher configuration
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DisplayPort video output
  • VR Support: Steam VR only, requires Oculus Touch/Valve Index controllers or better controllers
